title: New drug brings unexpected hope in targeting cancer cells

title_detail.value: New drug brings unexpected hope in targeting cancer cells

summary: An unexpected finding in preclinical platelet studies could provide a novel approach to targeting and destroying difficult-to-treat cancer cells, providing new therapeutic options for a range of cancers.

summary_detail.value: An unexpected finding in preclinical platelet studies could provide a novel approach to targeting and destroying difficult-to-treat cancer cells, providing new therapeutic options for a range of cancers.
